item.title: @CNRS - Freelance
item.description: One of the two services provided is to assist for the implementation of a corporate philanthropy research policy for a Global Youth Climate Pact for a cluster of research Center including CNRS - National Center for Scientific Research which leed to a seminary at COP21.

item.title: @Sorbonne University - Student
item.description: Does microcredit embolden education ? Master's thesis written during my master's degree in applied economics at Sorbonne University.
